author: apfeiffer1
body: This PR allows to add an optional schema/DB name ('cms_conditions' by default) to the db shortcut name via <shortcut>:<schema> for simple accesses to different DBs (e.g. dev:cms_conditions_002). This PR also resets the default for dev to cms_conditions to be consistent with the DB uploads via the dropbox, and removes the obsolete _boost_ shortcuts.
title: adding schema to db shortcut name
